FuncDef:
The same discriminator disable command configures the device not to use the same local and remote discriminators of multicast BFD.
The undo same discriminator disable command cancels the configuration. The same discriminator disable command configures the device not to use the same local and remote discriminators of multicast BFD. The undo same discriminator disable command cancels the configuration. By default, local and remote discriminators of multicast BFD can use the same value.
